boons.name: Lightning Strike
boons.description: Your Attack emits chain-lightning when you damage a foe.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Bounces: 4
  • Bounce Range: 520
  • Deals reduced damage per bounce.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Thunder Flourish
boons.description: Your Special causes a lightning bolt to strike nearby foes.
boons.notes:
Has internal cooldown of .2 per target. (Bolt only triggers, at most, 5 times per second per enemy)

Tier 1

  • Damage Radius: 200
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Electric Shot
boons.description: Your Cast is a burst of chain-lightning that bounces between foes.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Bounces: 5
  • Bounce Range: 720
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Thunder Flare
boons.description: Your Cast causes a lightning bolt to strike nearby foes.
boons.prerequisites: Unique to Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Thunder Dash
boons.description: Your Dash causes a lightning bolt to strike nearby foes.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Zeus' Aid
boons.description: Your Call makes lightning strike nearby foes repeatedly for 1.5 Sec.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Max Gauge Bonus: 9 Sec. Duration
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Heaven's Vengeance
boons.description: After you take damage, your foe is struck by lightning.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Lightning Reflexes
boons.description: After you Dash just before getting hit, a bolt strikes a nearby foes.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Storm Lightning
boons.description: Your chain-lightning effects bounce more times before expiring.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Electric Shot gains 3, 6 or 9 jumps from this boon instead.
boons.prerequisites: Electric Shot or Lightning Strike

boons.name: High Voltage
boons.description: Your lightning bolt effects deal damage in a larger area.
boons.prerequisites: Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid

boons.name: Double Strike
boons.description: Your lightning bolt effects have a chance to strike twice.
boons.prerequisites: Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid

boons.name: Static Discharge
boons.description: Your lightning effects also make foes Jolted.
boons.prerequisites: Thunder Flourish, Zeus' Aid, Thunder Dash, Heaven's Vengeance, Lightning Strike, Electric Shot, or Lightning Reflexes

boons.name: Clouded Judgment
boons.description: Your God Gauge charges faster when you deal or take damage.
boons.prerequisites: Aphrodite's Aid, Ares' Aid, Artemis' Aid, Athena's Aid, Demeter's Aid, Dionysus' Aid, Poseidon's Aid, or Zeus' Aid

boons.name: Billowing Strength
boons.description: After using Call, you deal more damage for 15 Sec.
boons.prerequisites: Aphrodite's Aid, Ares' Aid, Artemis' Aid, Athena's Aid, Demeter's Aid, Dionysus' Aid, Poseidon's Aid, or Zeus' Aid

boons.name: Splitting Bolt
boons.description:
All your lightning effects create an additional burst.
  • Lightning Damage: 40
boons.notes:
Tier 3
  • The additional burst is a slow moving spark.
  • Spark Speed: 500
  • Bounces: 5
  • Bounce Range: 520
boons.prerequisites: Double Strike, High Voltage, or Storm Lightning

boons.name: Smoldering Air
boons.description:
Your Call charges up automatically, but is capped at 25%.
  • Auto Gauge Gain: 1% every .2 seconds
boons.notes: • Cannot be combined with Sigil of the Dead
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Zeus: Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, Electric Shot, or Zeus' Aid
  • Aphrodite: Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish, Crush Shot, Passion Dash, or Aphrodite's Aid

boons.name: Vengeful Mood
boons.description:
Your Revenge attacks sometimes occur without taking damage.
  • Auto-Revenge Rate: 3 Sec.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Zeus: Electric Shot, Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid
  • Ares: Ares' Aid, Blade Dash, Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain, or Slicing Shot
  • Revenge boon: Curse of Vengeance, Frozen Touch, Heaven's Vengeance, Holy Shield, or Wave of Despair

boons.name: Lightning Rod
boons.description:
Your collectible strike nearby foes with lightning every 1 Sec.
  • Lightning Damage: 70
boons.notes:
• Requires the Infernal Soul Mirror Ability
  • Lowers the range at which you can pick up
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Zeus: Electric Shot, Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter Dash, or True Shot

boons.name: Lightning Phalanx
boons.description:
Your Phalanx Shot Cast bounces between nearby foes.
  • Max Bounces: 5
boons.notes: • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Zeus: Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid
  • Athena: Phalanx Shot

boons.name: Cold Fusion
boons.description:
Jolted status does not expire on your enemies' attacks.
  • Jolted duration: 10 Sec.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Zeus: Static Discharge
  • Demeter: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, or Mistral Dash

boons.name: Scintillating Feast
boons.description:
Your Festive Fog effects also deal lightning damage periodically.
  • Lightning Damage: 60
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Zeus: Electric Shot, Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid
  • Dionysus: High Tolerance or Trippy Shot

boons.name: Sea Storm
boons.description:
Your knock-away effects also cause foes to be struck by lightning.
  • Lightning Damage 40
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Zeus: Electric Shot, Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, or Tempest Strike

curse.name: jolted
curse.description: Victim's next attack self-inflicts lightning damage that harms itself and nearby foes.
